The Fire Rises! An Agile Burndown Chart

Agile Iteration Burndown Chart

A project that uses a couple of JS libraries (Raphael and Morris.js) to render a nice SVG burndown chart for Agile iterations.

Ideally the data it uses could be provided via an API, but for now it reads an HTML table that has daily totals of remaining story points.

Demo

This branch currently has a demo that can be run as a jsFiddle, taking advantage of an interesting feature in jsFiddle that allows you to run code from GitHub.

This site was built using Assemble.io and Grunt.
